question: Tell me about a time when you had to work under a tight deadline. How did you handle it?
Describe a situation where you received critical feedback. How did you respond?
Can you give an example of a time when you had to quickly learn a new technology?
Tell me about a time when you had a disagreement with a teammate. How did you resolve it?
Describe a situation where you had to prioritize multiple tasks. How did you manage it?
Can you share an example of when you took initiative to improve a project?
Tell me about a time when you faced a major bug or issue. How did you troubleshoot it?
Describe a situation where you collaborated with other teams to achieve a goal.
Have you ever missed a deadline? How did you handle it with your team or manager?
Tell me about a project you worked on that required strong communication skills.
